title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9.11 - Executive Order No. 11: Continuing the Declaration of Disaster Emergency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9.11 - Executive Order No. 11: Continuing the Declaration of Disaster Emergency

State Regulations
WHEREAS, pursuant to Executive Order 211, issued July 6, 2021, a statewide disaster was declared across the State due to gun
violence; NOW, THEREFORE, I, KATHY HOCHUL, Governor of the State of

New York, by virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution and

Article 2-B of the Executive Law, York, do hereby extend the state disaster
emergency as set forth in Executive Order 211, as continued in Executive Order
3.5, and continue the terms, conditions, and suspensions contained in Executive

Order 211, until April 21 2022. GIVEN under my hand and the Privy Seal of the State in the

City of Albany this twenty-second day of March in the year two thousand
twenty-two. Signed: Kathy Hochul

Dated: March 22, 2022

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
9.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
